author: hairong
msg: Merge -r 743891:743892 from trunk to move the change of HADOOP-5192 to branch 0.20.

author: trawick
msg: Fix a crash with r742218 by calling apr_os_thread_put() properly.
(The first parameter to apr_os_thread_put() must be initialized, either to
NULL or to an existing apr_thread_t.)

author: hairong
msg: HADOOP-5192. When replication fails, a block receiver should not remove a block that's created or being written by other threads. Contributed by Hairong Kuang.

author: gnodet
msg: SMX4KNL-184: align the command names with the gshell ones
